name: Aspera - Demo 1
description:
Small demo about slimes and more slimes.

This version only contains the combat system.
It has been made for prototyping purposes.

Credits:
Song made by Myntian and I
End music (ambience) made by Myntian
Most sound effects are from "The Essential Retro Video Game Sound Effects Collection" by Juhani Junkala
Aspera's avatar (temporary) is from OneShot (Great Game!)
